pois.name: Medina of Tunis
pois.description: Get lost in the magical maze of the old town! This UNESCO site is a living museum with hidden cafes, artisan shops, and centuries of history around every corner.

pois.name: Carthage Archaeological Site
pois.description: Walk where Hannibal once stood! Explore the ruins of the empire that challenged Rome, with stunning Mediterranean views.

pois.name: Sidi Bou Said
pois.description: The famous blue and white village! Perfect for photos, sipping mint tea with sea views, and buying traditional crafts.

pois.name: Dar El Jeld Restaurant
pois.description: Feast like a king in a restored palace! The most famous spot for authentic Tunisian cuisine in a magical setting.

pois.name: Ksar Ouled Soltane
pois.description: Discover the incredible 'ghorfas' - ancient fortified granaries that look like something from another planet!

pois.name: El Jem Amphitheatre
pois.description: Stand in Africa's best-preserved Roman arena! Imagine gladiators and chariots in this colossal structure.

pois.name: Dougga Archaeological Site
pois.description: Explore one of the best-preserved Roman towns in Africa! Wander through ancient theaters, temples, and houses frozen in time.

pois.name: Tozeur Desert Oasis
pois.description: Discover a magical sea of palm trees in the desert! Walk through ancient irrigation systems and enjoy the shade of thousands of date palms.

pois.name: Monastir Ribat
pois.description: Climb ancient fortress walls with breathtaking sea views! This Islamic monastery was also a filming location for Monty Python.

pois.name: Djerba Island
pois.description: Experience the 'Island of Dreams' with its white beaches, colorful markets, and unique blend of Muslim and Jewish heritage.

pois.name: Kairouan Great Mosque
pois.description: Visit one of Islam's holiest cities and marvel at the stunning architecture of one of Africa's oldest mosques.
